data.name: Climb Challage - Castle
data.detailed_description:
The player needs to climb the castle by clinging and climbing the walls.

The player controls the girl using the Wasd keys and the mouse. And jumping on the space.

The task is to reach the flag by overcoming all obstacles.

When falling from a height, the player's health will be taken away, when it ends
the player will die and he will have to start the passage again.
The game has achievements and a leaderboard, whoever gets to the flag faster will get more points

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
